articles.author: Natasha Lomas
articles.title: Meta's 'pay or consent' model fails EU competition rules, Commission finds - TechCrunch
articles.description: The EC has found that Meta's "pay or consent" offer to Facebook and Instagram users in Europe does not comply with the bloc's DMA.
articles.content: An investigation conducted by the European Commission has found that Meta’s “pay or consent” offer to Facebook and Instagram users in Europe does not comply with the bloc’s Digital Markets Act (DMA),… [+5788 chars]
